bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Glasgow family from Rockbridge County, Va., includes teachers, lawyers, and soldiers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists largely of correspondence within the Glasgow/Paxton/Anderson family. Correspondence related to Rebekah A. Glasgow dates from 1846 to 1903, and correspondence within the Paxton family dates from 1897 to 1900. Also includes limited correspondence from Ellen Glasgow.
